did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Typescript articles of incorporation, by-laws, and minutes of meetings of a lumber company based in Tucson, Arizona.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Willcox Lumber Company records (AZ 383). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Board members: John H. Campbell, Archie R. Conner, and Ella H. Estill.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescript articles of incorporation, by-laws, and minutes of meetings of a lumber company based in Tucson, Arizona.
